title: Inline & Mass Edit Query Results
overview:
After running an Account query, updates can be made in two ways: 

Inline Editing: Double-click a cell to edit a value. If multiple rows are selected, you can apply the change to all selected Accounts in one action. 
Mass Editing: Select rows and open the Mass Edit modal (layout-style form). Edit field values once, then Apply to all selected Accounts and Save. The modal also supports making a blank update without changes.
generalUseCase: Use Inline & Mass Edit to quickly update multiple records directly from query resultsâ€”metadata-aware and respectful of field types and configurations.
